channel.title: Players online at top of client

item.title: Players online at top of client
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Codez Epic Codez
item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

Declare this method:

    [code]
public void writePlayers() {
			int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
	sendFrame126("Forgotten City ("+ players + " players online)", 6570);
            setInterfaceWalkable(6673);
    }[/code]

Put this in your TextHandler:

	    p.sendFrame126("", 6572);
            p.sendFrame126("", 6664);

Add this to your process:

Read full topic
item.source: Players online at top of client
